mapper.select: with recursive cte as( select cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef, 1 as level from book_category where cateCodeRef is null union all select c.cateName, c.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, 1+level as level from book_category c inner join cte on c.cateCodeRef = cte.cateCode ) select cateName,cateCode,cateCodeRef,level from cte;
